articles.description: Manuel Neuer and Bayern Munich team-mate Benjamin Pavard have reacted after Sadio Mane's move from Liverpool was completed
articles.content:
Two Bayern Munich players have reacted to Sadio Mane leaving Liverpool to join the German club.

articles.title: Three takeaways as Pakistan name Test squad for crucial Sri Lanka series - International Cricket Council
articles.description: Pakistan on Wednesday, 22 June named a strong 18-member squad for the two Tests against Sri Lanka in July, a series part of the ICC World Test Championship 2021-23 cycle. Here are the key takeaways.
